Name: ABBY LANE MANOR
PublicDescription: Abby Lane Manor is a women's complex offering spacious private and shared rooms that is just a ten minute walk from campus. Our girls enjoy amenities such as free laundry, personal vanities in each bedroom, 3 bathrooms, 2 fridges, A/C, free off track storage, and parking passes for only $25! As you can imagine we fill up extremely fast, so come sign up today!

Name: ABRI APARTMENTS - MEN
PublicDescription: We offer two beautiful and unique floor plans! Our Deluxe is all one floor and our Townhome is two floors. Upscale, modern finishes, state-of-the-art fitness center, fully equipped clubhouse, study rooms, courtyard with fire pit & grills! 3 FULL Baths! 55" Smart TVs in each apt! Contact us today!

Name: ABRI APARTMENTS - WOMEN
PublicDescription: Deluxe & Townhome Floorplans! Offering early bird special of $100 off! Upscale, modern finishes, state-of-the-art fitness center, fully equipped clubhouse, study rooms, courtyard with firepit & grills! 3 FULL Baths! 55" Smart TVs in each apt! Ask us about our amazing rates with our track leases & 12 month lease! Price reflects early bird discount.

Name: ALLDREDGE HOUSE
PublicDescription: Hurry quick! Come make ALLDREDGE HOUSE your home away from home! Located directly across the street from the Clarke Building and only a few blocks away from down town. Great Ward with the guys right next door!

Name: ALLEN'S SUNRISE VILLAGE - MEN
PublicDescription: Sale on multi-semester contracts happening now.  Save up to $175 + FREE Laundry! We are well-known for our friendliness, two refrigerators, low prices, great location, our free laundry, reliable OPTIX internet and amazing managers. You'll love having all Sunrise men and women in your ward! We would love to show you why everyone loves to live at Sunrise Village. www.SunriseVillageApts.com

Name: ALLEN'S SUNRISE VILLAGE - WOMEN
PublicDescription: Sale on multi-semester contracts happening now.  Save up to $175 + FREE Laundry! Name: ALPINE CHALET
PublicDescription: Alpine Chalet is a great place to live!  It is close to campus and surrounded by many BYUI housing complexes.  It has an amazing pool, hot tub, and weight room. Not to mention, we added 2nd fridges and smart TVs to all of our apartments! There is an outdoor gas fire pit and built-in barbecue area that is great for hanging out with friends or studying.

Name: AMERICAN AVENUE - MEN
PublicDescription: At American Avenue we have several apartment layouts for you to make home.  We are currently under renovation and things are amazing! Our apartment homes have shared room or private room options next to campus and steps from downtown Rexburg. We offer covered parking and great savings when you sign multi-semester contracts.  Right now you can save up to $175!

Name: AMERICAN AVENUE - WOMEN
PublicDescription: At American Avenue we have several apartment layouts for you to make home.  We are currently under renovation & things are amazing! Our apartment homes have shared room or private room options next to campus & steps from downtown Rexburg. We offer great savings when you sign multi-semester contracts & a friend referral bonus! Right now you can save up to $175!

Name: ARCADIA APARTMENTS
PublicDescription: Arcadia Apartments is located just across from the BYU-Idaho Center, literally steps from campus. Arcadia is priced at just $400. Arcadia offers clean, comfortable apartments with a very social atmosphere.  Awesome amenities include; sand Volleyball, Basketball Court, Apple TV, and so much more.  Call/text us at 208-881-2935 for info or to schedule a tour!

Name: AT THE GROVE
PublicDescription: At The Grove is a spacious basement apartment, located just a stone's throw away from the east side of campus, and around the corner from the temple. Here you will enjoy the feeling of "home," in apartment laundry, great managers, a great ward, and a large backyard. You'll feel right at home here At The Grove!

Name: AUTUMN WINDS - MEN
PublicDescription: Private rooms! Only 4 students per apartment. Two bathroom and in-unit W/D.  Very well maintained and close to campus!!  We have plenty of parking, a nice lounge, a fantastic ward, and a long list of Rexburg Housing amenities that include 2 swimming pools, theater room, free haircuts, and much more! Spots in Autumn Winds get reserved extremely quickly, so sign up for your own private room NOW!

Name: AUTUMN WINDS - WOMEN
PublicDescription: Autumn Winds offers Private rooms with only 4 people per apartment! There are two bathrooms with 2 sinks each, so you will have your own vanity area. Each apartment has in-unit W/D, so you won't need to drag your laundry anywhere. We have plenty of parking, a nice lounge, a fantastic ward, and a long list of Rexburg Housing amenities. Space at Autumn Winds goes quickly, so reserve your spot today!

Name: AVONLEA - MEN
PublicDescription: A short three-minute walk to the Hart Building! Enjoy a great social atmosphere living directly across from Avonlea Women. Tons of parking is available in our overflow lot. The massive bedrooms feature in-bedroom bathrooms. Amenities include two fridges, wall-mounted TVs, free laundry, and an awesome lounge with a barbecue patio, ping pong, foosball, and a large movie room!

Name: AVONLEA - WOMEN
PublicDescription: Avonlea prides itself on being one of the most sought-after properties at BYU-I. You’ll enjoy the beautiful grounds for relaxing, games, or FHE parties and an amazing location so close to campus! Each unit has private and shared rooms, a washer/dryer, a spacious vanity and bathroom area, a homey feel, and the ward is amazing! The lounge has study areas, a piano room, and a TV for movie nights!

Name: BAYSIDE MANOR
PublicDescription: With its prime location close to the girls dorms and across the street from campus, you can get the off-campus experience and great location all at the same time. Bayside Manor is a basement apartment that houses 8 girls. It has 3 large bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 refrigerators, study room, storage room, laundry room, fireplace, internet, cable t.v., yard, & lots of space! Call today 208-794-0652

Name: BIRCH PLAZA - MEN
PublicDescription: Some choose to spend all of their BYU-Idaho years living at Birch Plaza. That's how good it is. The wards are outstanding, and there's a sense of community that you'll find almost nowhere else. Birch Plaza has an onsite a hot tub, an exercise room, and a spacious lounge. It's also right across the street from the BYU Idaho stadium! You'll love it here.

Name: BIRCH PLAZA - WOMEN
PublicDescription: Some girls choose to spend all of their BYU-Idaho years living at Birch Plaza. That's how good it is. The wards are outstanding, and there's a sense of community that you'll find almost nowhere else. Birch Plaza has a hot tub, an exercise room, and a spacious lounge. It's also right across the street from the BYU Idaho stadium! You'll love it here.

Name: BIRCH WOOD I
PublicDescription: Birch Plaza Premium is a very special place. The ward is outstanding, as are the residents. There's a hot tub and ample parking. A city park is one block away, and BYUI campus is half a block in the other direction. We've got girls from across the country and around the globe, including many returned missionaries. You'll love Birch Plaza Premium!

Name: BIRCH WOOD II
PublicDescription: Extra large PRIVATE rooms, with some shared rooms as well. Washer and dryer inside your apartment! Across the street from campus. With the BEST student ward! Hurry and sign up, because these very limited spots always fill up early. You're going to LOVE Birchwood II!

Name: BLUE DOOR, THE - MEN
PublicDescription: At Blue Door, you’ll have two fridges, an in-unit washer/dryer, and a TV! There is an impressive open space with volleyball courts, a fire pit, and a basketball court. The social atmosphere is amazing! The lounge has ping pong, foosball, a piano, and a large TV for movie nights.

Name: BLUE DOOR, THE - WOMEN
PublicDescription: At Blue Door, you’ll have two fridges, an in-unit washer/dryer, and a TV! There is an impressive open space with volleyball courts, a fire pit, and a basketball court. The social atmosphere is amazing! The lounge has ping pong, foosball, a piano, and a large TV for movie nights.

Name: BOUNTIFUL PLACE
PublicDescription: Make Bountiful Place your home for just $1099. Large bedrooms, newer construction, high ceilings, modern furnishings, a piano in the lounge, and study rooms on site make this complex an amazing deal. Bountiful offers AC, 50" flat-screen TV with Roku, free laundry, a fire pit, 2 fridges, large bedrooms, and waffles every Wednesday! Call/text us today at 208-351-7080!

Name: BRIARWOOD APARTMENTS
PublicDescription: Briarwood is a small, tight-knit community of four apartments that shares a lounge with neighboring Greenbrier (men and women housing). The lounge has ping-pong, foosball, a piano, study tables, and a TV for movie nights! Each unit has a free washer and dryer, dishwasher, spacious bedrooms, a huge bathroom, two standing showers, and a two-sink vanity. There is tons of parking at Briarwood.

Name: BRIGHTON APARTMENTS - MEN
PublicDescription:
You’ll easily find your home away from home at Brighton! Four different floor plans with private rooms and shared rooms available. Laundry in each apartment/townhouse, TV's, reliable internet. Quiet, fun and friendly atmosphere. Laundry, free parking with 165 spaces, A/C, and all utilities included! 
Our office is located in the clubhouse. Open M-F 9-5, (208)356-9693

Name: BRIGHTON APARTMENTS - WOMEN
PublicDescription:
Come see our girls townhomes! Built the summer of 2012 and 2016. Only 4 girls to a townhome! 2 Large and roomy bedrooms upstairs. Washer and dryer in each townhome. Club house with a pool table, ping pong, air hockey table, kitchen, fireplace & large flat screen. 

NO hidden fees! FREE parking, laundry, Optix internet and utilities! Office is in the clubhouse. Open M-F (208) 356-9693

Name: BROOKLYN APARTMENTS
PublicDescription: Brooklyn Apartments is a wonderful place to live, study, meet new friends and grow. Living here makes socializing, getting to class and shopping easier as we are located in the heart of Rexburg and only one block from campus. Our new furniture and carpet offers quality and comfortable living at a great low price. Come by and check us out!

Name: BROOKSIDE VILLAGE - MEN
PublicDescription: Brookside Village is a unique community of private bedroom town homes. We offer a large party kitchen and dining area.  The bedrooms have built in dresser and shelves in the closet. Storage rooms are in the apartment, so you don't have to go very far to leave your items on your off track. This is the perfect place if you are looking for privacy and a social lifestyle all mixed into one!

Name: BROOKSIDE VILLAGE - WOMEN

Name: BUENA VISTA
PublicDescription:
Buena Vista is perfect for the dedicated student. We're a friendly house located in a quiet neighborhood just two blocks from campus and a ten minute walk from the temple. There is a piano in every apartment and we also have an apartment garden.
Returning resident discounts!

Prices:

Fall: $925
Winter: $900
Spring: $850

Name: BUNKHOUSE
PublicDescription: Bunkhouse Apartments provide a down-to-earth living environment that you'll love! Located across the street from the BYU-Idaho Center, surrounded by women's housing and next to some of Rexburg's best restaurants, you'll enjoy your choice of 3 floorplans, excellent wards and FREE LAUNDRY!!! Make sure to visit our website for details and sign a contract: www.bunkhouseapts.com

Name: CAMDEN APARTMENTS - MEN
PublicDescription:
Camden Apartments is a PRIVATE ROOM complex, only ONE block away from campus! The free Walmart Shuttle also picks up right outside. 

https://www.camdenrexburg.com 208-656-9611

Name: CARRIAGE HOUSE
PublicDescription: Each apt has 2 FRIDGES, a free WASHER/DRYER, and captains beds for extra storage. From our managers to our maintenance, we’ll strive to make your experience here fantastic! Enjoy living directly across the street from campus (only a 1-2 min walk). You’ll have a spacious lounge with a large TV, study tables, and a piano/music room. Outside there are shade trees lots of grass!

Name: CARRIAGE HOUSE TOWNHOUSE
PublicDescription: This spacious townhouse has 4 bedrooms, study and storage rooms, 2 bathrooms, and 2 living rooms. It's directly across the street from campus! It comes with 2 fridges, an in-unit washer/dryer,  available parking at nearby lots, and The Carriage House lounge next door.

Name: CEDARS, THE - MEN
PublicDescription: The Cedars is conveniently located kiddie-corner to campus. We offer both above and under-ground parking and discounts to nearby food and clothing shops. Our apartments are spacious, modern, and homey with plenty of storage space, two fridges and large televisions! Laundry is free with laundry facilities on each floor. Come experience a home away from home.

Name: CEDARS, THE - WOMEN
PublicDescription:
Welcome to one of the best housing complexes in Rexburg! We are a complex with 74 apartments that have three bedroom shared units. In each unit there are 3 bathrooms, two fridges, and in apartment laundry. 
 Activities will always include young men from our neighboring Mens Cedars complex across the street! Come check out an exciting and fun complex!

Name: CENTRE SQUARE - MEN
PublicDescription: If you want to live in Zion, this is the place. We listened to your needs/wants and here they are. Extra storage, large kitchen & pantry, wonderful vanities, free use of washer & dryer in each apartment, study rooms, gathering rooms, music rooms, green space, etc. Come enjoy.

Name: CENTRE SQUARE - WOMEN
PublicDescription: If you want to live in Zion, this is the place. We listened to your needs/wants and here they are. Extra storage, large kitchen & pantry, wonderful vanities, free use washer & dryer in each apartment, study rooms, gathering rooms, music rooms, green space, etc. Come enjoy.

Name: CHAPMAN HOUSE
PublicDescription: Converting to women's housing Spring 2022! Chapman House is a large house with 5 private bedrooms, 1 shared bedroom, 3 bathrooms, and a huge living room! The house has a free washer/dryer and tons of parking! The large floor plan and proximity to campus (one-block away) are amazing as well as the shared lounge (ping-pong, foosball, TV, study tables, piano).

Name: CLARKE APARTMENTS
PublicDescription: AFFORDABLE, ABUNDANT LIVING AT CLARKE APARTMENTS! Clarke can be your next home just steps away from campus. Each apartment comes with a washer and dryer. Call us today at 208-356-6660 or apply online at clarkeapartments.com!

Name: COLLEGE AVENUE APARTMENTS
PublicDescription: Plemty of parkimg,  Fabulous location across from campus.  Surrounded by byui play yards .  Great internet and free washer and dryer in the apartment. Plenty of hot water. Two full kitchens and two baths with vanity and sink area. Porch with picnic table. Great mattresses. 50 inch tv

Name: COLONIAL HEIGHTS TOWNHOUSES
PublicDescription:
Spacious 3 level townhouse, includes 4 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, living room, kitchen (with 2 refrigerators) and a front and back porch. Rent includes free High Speed Internet, electricity and free washer/dryer facilities in each apartment. 
PRIVATE BEDROOMS ARE AN ADDITIONAL $100.
Summer Session contracts are ONLY sold with a Fall Contract. 
We do not rent over the Christmas Break.

Name: DELTA PHI APARTMENTS

Name: GATES, THE - MEN
PublicDescription: The Gates is a top-of-the-line affordable Townhome. Some of the largest rooms in Rexburg with personal closets and separate bathrooms for each bedroom. You’ll save hundreds on laundry, utilities, and parking. Call today!

Come take a look!

Name: JACOB'S HOUSE
PublicDescription: This house has an unbelievable kitchen with a huge island and two fridges. With over 3,000 square feet, it feels very spacious and comfortable. It is also less than a block from campus!

Name: MILANO FLATS - WOMEN
PublicDescription: Milano Flats offers all private rooms. Our amenities include a hot tub, two grills, a fitness center, study room with free printing, music room, pool table, fire pits, tanning beds, and more. The apartments include radiant floor heating and a/c units . We have lots of parking if you own a vehicle, if not, we are just a 10 minute walk to most buildings on campus. Come check us out!

Name: MOUNTAIN CREST
PublicDescription: Your Home Away From Home--With its awesome location, great amenity package & excellent rates, Mountain Crest is the ideal approved housing for young men. We are located right across the street from Porter Park. Included in our great rates are a WASHER/DRYER IN EACH UNIT as well as 2 fridges, HIGH-SPEED INTERNET, & free parking. Give us a call or drop in and check us out. You won't be disappointed.

Name: NAUVOO HOUSE I
PublicDescription: Nauvoo House is a mixed gender complex, just a block away from campus.  At Nauvoo House, you can find the best social experience with friendly neighbors and events that will make your college experience a memorable one. We have fitness rooms, a 2-story clubhouse, theater rooms, basketball area, fiber optic internet, outdoor park and pavilion, BBQ grills and outdoor gas campfire!

Name: NAUVOO HOUSE II
PublicDescription: Nauvoo House is a mixed gender complex, just a block away from campus.  At Nauvoo House, you can find the best social experience with friendly neighbors and events that will make your college experience a memorable one. We have fitness rooms, a 2-story clubhouse, theater rooms, basketball area, fiber optic internet, outdoor park and pavilion, BBQ grills and outdoor gas campfire!

Name: NORTHPOINT - MEN
PublicDescription: Experience the finest men's housing in Rexburg. Located directly across from campus with modern, comfortable apartments and amazing amenities.  Sign up on our website or come in for a tour.

Name: NORTHPOINT - WOMEN
PublicDescription: Experience the finest Women's housing in Rexburg.  Located directly across from campus with modern, comfortable apartments and amazing amenities.  Sign up on our website or come in for a tour.

Name: PARK VIEW APTS - MEN
PublicDescription: Directly across the street from beautiful Porter Park and only two blocks away from campus, Park View Apartments offers walking distance access for students, while maintaining a home environment feeling.  We offer many different floor plans with a washer and dryer in each unit.  With a great ward, unique setup fun outdoor space and a great new game room, come see if this is the place for you!

Name: PARK VIEW APTS - WOMEN
PublicDescription: ParkView is unique from most complexes, as we are a group of homes converted into apartments. Directly overlooking Porter Park and nestled among large beautiful trees with open grassy areas, ParkView offers a cozy, personal atmosphere and a great ward at an affordable price! We offer a variety of floor plans to choose from, and all resident parking is completely free!

Name: PINCOCK HOUSE
PublicDescription: This is one of the most popular places at BYU-Idaho because it has 7 private bedrooms! Private bedrooms are perfect because they give space to study and rest peacefully. The home has a very large floor plan; a big kitchen; two fridges; a spacious living room; tons of parking; a lounge with ping-pong, TV, study tables, and piano.

Name: PINES, THE - MEN
PublicDescription: The Pines is a BYU-I approved men and women's housing complex. We are located across the street from campus next to the stadium. The Pines is within walking distance to movie theaters, restaurants, shops, and grocery stores. We have a pool table, fire pit, on site laundry, pianos, and exercise equipment. Save over $150 when you sign a multiple semester contract!

Name: PINES, THE - WOMEN
PublicDescription: Enjoy flat screen TV’s, high speed internet, and new carpet. Relax by the fireplace in our lobby or build your own fire in our outdoor fire pit. Use our exercise room or try out our piano. With our location and social activities, we are the place to be! To save over $150, sign a Dual Semester Contract for only $1000 per semester!

Name: PINNACLE POINT
PublicDescription: Don't miss out on Pinnacle Point. NO WHITE GLOVE CLEANING REQUIRED and $50 (summer) & $100 (fall, winter & Spring) vending credit. Just one block away from campus, we provide Optix high-speed Internet, an amazing gym, theater room, and game room. Each apartment has air conditioning, flat screen TVs with Roku, and free onsite laundry. Call 208-360-2845 or visit us online at rexburgpinnacle.com!

Name: RED DOOR, THE
PublicDescription: At Red Door, we have washers/dryers, wall-mounted TV’s, dishwashers, and double-sink vanities in every apartment! You’ll enjoy a fire pit and lounge for movie nights, studying, and foosball. It is super close to campus (only 1/2 block). The environment is social and friendly with both men’s and women’s housing.

Name: RIVIERA APARTMENTS
PublicDescription:
Check our Website for Discounts!! With our friendly homey atmosphere, we're your perfect 'home away from home'. So close to campus, we're almost part of it. We're just steps away from the heart of campus. You can quickly walk anywhere. No hassle finding parking. Come be a part of Riviera!
6-girl apartments have 2 refrigerators, 2 bathrooms, 2 vanity sinks and so much more.

Name: ROCKLAND APARTMENTS
PublicDescription: Rockland is a fantastic property with 2-person, 4-person, and 6-person units available. We have one of the few indoor heated swimming pools in Rexburg, and a great weight room onsite - so we've got you covered all year long with great amenities. Located one block from the BYU-Idaho center at the heart of campus. It just doesn't get any better than this. Apply online today!

Name: ROYAL CREST
PublicDescription: If you are looking for affordable, comfortable, social living then Royal Crest is the place for you this semester. With our convenient location in Rexburg, you can be sure to be close to all the community and BYU-Idaho activities. With a serene and casual setting, you`re sure to feel at home with us.

Name: SHELBOURNE APARTMENTS
PublicDescription: Come home to Shelbourne! HUGE double refrigerators in every unit, large living areas, & you can have your own private bedroom! Why share? In-unit washers and dryers (free), internet & big screen HDTV's. Stop by to take a tour and see for yourself what we have to offer! You can sure pay more, but you won't get much more. Convenient payment plans available. Come see what we have to offer..

Name: SNOWVIEW APARTMENTS
PublicDescription: Our location is unbeatable! Just a crosswalk away from the heart of campus and walking distance from a grocery store, movie theater, and fun restaurants.These town homes house 4 ladies (That means more fridge space than a 6-person apartment!) and the bedrooms and bathroom are upstairs completely separate from the large living area. SnowView offers free laundry and fresh remodels!

Name: SOMERSET APARTMENTS - MEN
PublicDescription: Somerset is located directly across the street from the heart of BYU-Idaho's campus. With a large parking lot, a laundry room (not in the apt.), and 24-hour maintenance teams we offer top-notch service.  Come see our clubhouse where you can watch your favorite games and shoot pool with your buddies. We also have an onsite weight room, along with all of Rexburg Housing's other fantastic amenities!

Name: SOMERSET APARTMENTS - WOMEN
PublicDescription: Somerset is located directly across the street from the heart of campus. These apartments had a major renovation completed in Fall 2015 for women.  The wards are fantastic and is all contained within Somerset. It is an experience you will love! We have a piano room, weight room, and large lounge where you can spend time with your friends.  Spaces fill up quickly-reserve your spot today!

Name: SPORI VILLA
PublicDescription:
Very convenient to college (across the street) and to downtown (2 blocks). Remodeled home next to N. side of campus.  All utilities included.  Plenty of off street parking for tenants.   
Payment plans, if needed.   Plenty of parking.

Free Laundry. Utilities included.  High speed wireless included.

Sunroom, patio, fire-pit, lawn.

Name: SUNDANCE - MEN
PublicDescription:
Sundance Apartments, BYU-Idaho’s newest Approved Housing for women and men is now leasing! Be the first to live in our custom built, high-end apartments located close to BYU-Idaho with amazing views and carefully planned gathering spaces and amenities.
We have 2 bedroom, 3 bedroom, and 4 bedroom units - all with private bathrooms, 65-in tvs, in apt laundry, and 2 fridges.

Name: SUNDANCE - WOMEN
PublicDescription:
Sundance Apartments, BYU-I’s newest Approved Housing for women and men is now leasing! Indoor hallways, carefully planned gathering areas..workout room in building, as well as numerous study rooms. Enjoy the game room in the men's building as well.
2 bedroom 3 bedroom and 4 bedroom units & each bedroom has it's own private bath, 65-in tvs, washer and dryer in unit, and 2 fridges.

Name: SUNSET HALL
PublicDescription: Sunset Hall is a house with two separate floors and entries making it comfortable, homey, and spacious! The property is a house less than 1 block from campus and the Hart Building (fitness center). Each floor has a washer/dryer, dishwasher, a huge kitchen, and plenty of vanity space to get ready each day. You’ll share the Avonlea lounge with a TV for movie nights, study tables, and a piano room!

Name: TOWERS I
PublicDescription: Offering more square footage than other new complexes, The Towers I is BYU-Idaho approved student housing for Men. Located close to campus, The Towers offer many amenities, including assigned underground parking, enclosed hallways, washer & dryers in each unit, high speed internet, lounge, theatre room, double insulated piano room, oh and guaranteed parking year round! Call today 208-569-6411!

Name: TOWERS II
PublicDescription: The Towers Two was built with you in mind! Assigned underground parking, the safety of enclosed hallways, a theater room, a gym, and several lounges-providing lots to do! Inside each unit, you have the luxury of a washer/dryer, 2 fridges, a spacious living room, & huge bedrooms. Have more questions or want to come in for a tour? Call or text us at (208)390-3706.

Name: UNIVERSITY VIEW - MEN
PublicDescription: Our 1,430 sq. feet apartments are located near campus and feature a full size washer and dryer in each apartment.  The apartments are complete with two full bathrooms, three bedrooms, and several storage areas.  Amenities include TWO FREE SHUTTLES to and from campus, large fitness center with dance and aerobic floor, two large lounges with kitchens and several study rooms.

Name: UNIVERSITY VIEW - WOMEN
PublicDescription: Our 1,430 sq. feet apartments are located near campus and feature a full size washer and dryer in each apartment.  The apartments are complete with two full bathrooms, three bedrooms, and several storage areas. Amenities include FREE SHUTTLES to and from campus, large fitness center with dance and aerobic floor, two large lounges with kitchens and several study rooms. NOW OFFERING RENOVATED UNITS!

Name: WHITFIELD HOUSE
PublicDescription: Converting to women's housing Spring 2022! Whitfield House is a popular home with 1 shared and 5 private bedrooms with lots of extra space and privacy to study and rest. Less than 1 block from campus, the home has a large floor plan; a spacious living room; plenty of storage; tons of parking; a lounge with ping-pong, foosball, TV, study tables, and piano.

Name: WINDSOR MANOR - MEN
PublicDescription:
Feel at home at Windsor Manor, 2 minutes from campus. 
We sort your mail, clean if your roommate doesn't pass, provide super fast maintenance response.
In your apartment, bathroom per bedroom, vacuum, washer/dryer + more…thermostat w/AC.
On-site off-track storage, gym, study/conference rooms for game nights, theater for you + 15 others, music rooms.
Visit our website to begin your adventure.

Name: WINDSOR MANOR - WOMEN
PublicDescription:
Feel at home at Windsor Manor, 2 minutes from campus. 
We sort your mail, clean if your roommate doesn't pass, provide super fast maintenance response.
In your apartment, bathroom per bedroom, vacuum, washer/dryer + more…thermostat w/AC.
On-site off-track storage, gym, study/conference rooms for game nights, theater for you + 15 others, music rooms.
Visit our website to begin your adventure.
